definitions.definition: A grating; a grid of wire or a sheet of material with a pattern of holes or slots, usually used to protect something while allowing the passage of air and liquids. Typical uses: to allow air through a fan while preventing fingers or objects from passing; to allow people to talk to somebody, while preventing attack.
On a vehicle, a slotted cover as above, to protect and hide the radiator, while admitting air to cool it.
A cooking device comprising a source of radiative heat and a means of holding food under it; a broiler in US English
A cooking device comprising a source of radiative and convective heat and a means of holding food above it; a barbecue.
definitions.example: I put some peppers and mushrooms on the grill to go with dinner.

definitions.definition: Food (designed to be) cooked on a grill.
definitions.example: a packet of frozen cauliflower cheese grills

definitions.definition: A grillroom; a restaurant serving grilled food.
definitions.example: These coupons will get you a discount at Johnny's Bar and Grill.

definitions.definition: A type of jewelry worn on the front teeth.
(by extension) The front teeth regarded collectively.
To cook (food) on a grill; to barbecue.
definitions.example: Why don't we get together Saturday and grill some burgers?

definitions.definition: To cook food under the element of a stove or only under the top element of an oven – broil, salamander.
To interrogate; to question aggressively or harshly.
definitions.example: The police grilled him about his movements at the time of the crime.

definitions.definition: To feel very hot; to swelter.
To stamp or mark with a grill.
